description: Ms. codex. Physical description: 23 lines per page, written in clear naskhi/ruqʻah script in black on yellowish paper. Original poem in violet. Fol. 134-149 contain an elaborate index in black or green. Some foxing, a little affected by dampness, many small wormholes. Origin: Copy completed by Muḥammad Raʼfat on 1 Jumādá al-Thāniyah 1300 (9 April 1882 AD).
author: Munāwī, ʻAbd al-Raʼūf ibn Tāj al-ʻĀrifīn, -1621
abstract: An extensive commentary on Ibn al-Wardī's one thousand-line poem on the interpretation of dreams. A rare ms.
extent: 149 leaves, bound : paper ; 224 x 175 (165 x 104) mm.
creator: Munāwī, ʻAbd al-Raʼūf ibn Tāj al-ʻĀrifīn, -1621
مناوي، عبد الرؤوف بن تاج العارفين.
dlme_creator_ara_latn: Munāwī, ʻAbd al-Raʼūf ibn Tāj al-ʻĀrifīn, -1621
dlme_creator_ara_arab: مناوي، عبد الرؤوف بن تاج العارفين.
subject: Ibn al-Wardī, Zayn al-Dīn ʻUmar ibn al-Muẓaffar, -1349—Alfīyah al-Wardīyah fī taʻbīr al-ruʼyā.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
